meanings.definition: A person in charge; a leader or boss.
meanings.sent1: The honchoes of the team made important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The company's honchoes held a meeting to discuss the new project.
meanings.sent3: The honchoes of the school organized a fun field trip for the students.
meanings.sent4: She was the honchoes of the household, keeping everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The honchoes of the tribe wore a special headdress to signify their leadership.

meanings.definition: To lead or manage a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: He honchoes the project team with efficiency and skill.
meanings.sent2: She honchoes the charity event every year to great success.
meanings.sent3: The cat honchoes the other pets in the house, always getting the best spot.
meanings.sent4: The sun honchoes the solar system, providing light and warmth to all planets.
meanings.sent5: The conductor honchoes the orchestra, guiding each musician with precision.
